summary: The Global Microscopic Polyangiitis (MPA) market is experiencing growth driven by the adoption of biologic therapies, which offer targeted mechanisms and improved relapse prevention. MPA, a rare ANCA-associated vasculitis, affects small blood vessels, posing risks to vital organs such as kidneys and lungs.
